mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_QNA_HIBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO QNA_HIBOARD ( QNA_HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{qnaHiBbsSeq}, #{userId}, #{qnaHiBbsSeq}, #{qnaHiBbsOrder}, #{qnaHiBbsIndent}, #{qnaHiBbsTitle}, #{qnaHiBbsContent}, 0, SYSDATE )

SELECT SEQ_QNA_HIBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO QNA_HIBOARD ( QNA_HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{qnaHiBbsSeq}, #{userId}, #{qnaHiBbsGroup}, #{qnaHiBbsOrder}, #{qnaHiBbsIndent}, #{qnaHiBbsTitle}, #{qnaHiBbsContent}, 0, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.QNA_HIBBS_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME2, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL2, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, 0) AS QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, 0) AS QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, 0) AS QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM QNA_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER2 B WHERE A.QNA_HIBBS_SEQ = #{value} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID2
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA_HIBOARD SET QNA_HIBBS_TITLE = #{qnaHiBbsTitle}, QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT = #{qnaHiBbsContent} WHERE QNA_HIBBS_SEQ = #{qnaHiBbsSeq}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(A.QNA_HIBBS_SEQ) AS CNT FROM QNA_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER2 B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID2
AND B.USER_NAME2 LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.QNA_HIBBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0

SELECT QNA_HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, QNA_HIBBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE FROM (SELECT A.QNA_HIBBS_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME2, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL2, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, 0) AS QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, 0) AS QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, 0) AS QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM QNA_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER2 B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID2
AND B.USER_NAME2 LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.QNA_HIBBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY A.QNA_HIBBS_GROUP DESC, A.QNA_HIBBS_ORDER ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_HIBOARD_FILE ( QNA_HIBBS_SEQ, QNA_FILE_SEQ, QNA_FILE_ORG_NAME, QNA_FILE_NAME, QNA_FILE_EXT, QNA_FILE_SIZE, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{qnaHiBbsSeq}, 1, #{qnaFileOrgName}, #{qnaFileName}, #{qnaFileExt}, #{qnaFileSize}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT QNA_HIBBS_SEQ, QNA_FILE_SEQ, NVL(QNA_FILE_ORG_NAME, '') AS QNA_FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(QNA_FILE_NAME, '') AS QNA_FILE_NAME, NVL(QNA_FILE_EXT, '') AS QNA_FILE_EXT, NVL(QNA_FILE_SIZE, 0) AS QNA_FILE_SIZE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM QNA_HIBOARD_FILE WHERE QNA_HIBBS_SEQ = #{value} AND QNA_FILE_SEQ = 1

SELECT QNA_HIBBS_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL2, '') AS USER_EMAIL2, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_GROUP, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_ORDER, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_INDENT, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_TITLE, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.QNA_HIBBS_PARENT, '') AS QNA_HIBBS_PARENT FROM QNA_HIBOARD A, TBL_USER2 B WHERE QNA_HIBBS_PARENT = #{qnaHiBbsSeq} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID2 ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC
